issue.title: [CF 1235] "Last Ability Used" detects different Spell IDs if they have the same name
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If I set the condition Last Ability Used to detect Spell ID:26573 (Consecrate), it also triggers if it detects Spell ID:81297 (The Consecrate damage ticks that affect mobs).

This behaviour happens with all spells where the Spell triggered by a button push has the same name as the Spell that does damage to the mob. Another example is Blessed Hammer. The button push triggers Spell ID:204019 but the Spell that damages enemies is Spell:204301.

What do you expect to happen?
If I set Last Ability Used to detect Spell ID:26573 (Consecrate), it will NOT detect Spell ID:81297 (The Consecrate damage ticks that affect mobs)

What happens instead?
When I set Last Ability Used to detect Spell ID:26573 (Consecrate), it will DOES detect Spell ID:81297 (The Consecrate damage ticks that affect mobs)

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
8.0.3

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)


> Posted by CurseForge user HawkBat85 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1235 | Raw

comments.body:
